message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you is $1000000. Let me know if you're interested!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $1050000. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1050000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $950000, which I believe is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm now offering the product to you for $1025000. This is the best I can do, so I hope you'll consider it.
